content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    --TOP 100 
    substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8) as [Date]
    --,Quantity
    --,ai_VCPUs
    --,Quantity * ai_VCPUs as [CPU Hours]
    ,sum(Quantity * ai_VCPUs) as [CPU Hours]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/2023*/Extended_v3_ACMMonthlyActualCost_*.parquet/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and ChargeType = 'Usage' --and benefitName is not NULL --and JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') is NULL --or MeterCategory = 'Cloud Services'
group by substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8)
order by substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8) DESC--, Quantity DESC
